channel.title: Observability on ShardingSphere
channel.description: Recent content in Observability on ShardingSphere

item.title: Core Concept
item.description: Agent Based on bytecode enhance and plugin design to provide APM, metrics event tracing and log output. Enable agent to collection data and then can display data into integrated 3rd APM projects. APM APM is the abbreviation for application performance monitoring. It works for performance diagnosis of distributed systems, including chain demonstration, application topology analysis and so on. Use agent to send tracing data into 3rd party APM protocols. Metrics System statistical indicator which collected from agent.
